alert.note: Alert for Wilbarger (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 11 at 2:21AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Comanche, northwestern Cotton, southeastern Jackson, south central Kiowa, Tillman and northeastern Wilbarger Counties through 300 AM CDT... At 220 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Mountain Park to 5 miles southeast of Tipton to 6 miles southeast of Fargo. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Northwestern Lawton, Frederick, Cache, Snyder, Grandfield, Tipton, Chattanooga, Mountain Park, Indiahoma, Davidson, Manitou, Faxon, Headrick, Hollister, Loveland, Fargo, and southwestern Fort Sill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
